verbose_text: ADAMTS13 activity levels of the patient plasma samples and recombinant human ADAMTS13 proteins (rhADAMTS13) were measured using the FRETS-VWF73 substrate (Peptides International, Louisville, Kentucky, United States) with normal human plasma pool (NHP; 0.01, 0.02, and 0.03 mug/mL) as a standard curve as previously described.
